metadata.description: The theme includes the following features: - Post Thumbnails - Widget-ready Sidebar - Left Sidebar - Footer on post with tags, catagories - Styled footer - Header on post with images and “Edit” link - Seo Friendly - Author info (on posts) - Comments with speech bubble ;o) - Pagerlink styled - Seo friendly (Removed google problem with rss and feed beeing keywords) - 301 redirect from http:// to http://www.
